projects.name: Janela
projects.description: (Currently under construction) Janela is a simple weather app designed to simulate a more detailed view of looking out your window before leaving for the day. I spent a lot of time practicing Vanilla CSS and .NET backend programming. The app calls multiple APIs for weather, location, and background image data.

projects.name: inCharge
projects.description: I made this project for my Capstone project for my degree. inCharge is a web app designed for operating room managers (like me) to have a quick-reference for all of their staff, operating rooms, and scheduled surgeries. Building inCharge was an excellent way for me to flex my C# skills and explore the .NET ecosystem.

projects.name: Ty Lewis
projects.description: This is the page you're on right now! I spent a lot of time refreshing my knowledge of React and learning TypeScript. I've used this site as an opportunity to go wild with my creativity and build something that I think represents my personality and professional presence.
